product_name: REI Merino Ultralight Hiker Quarter Socks
long_description: Comfortable for everyday wear or fast treks into the hills, our REI Merino Ultralight Hiker Quarter socks have a snug, sleek fit that works well with minimalist footwear. Made of merino lambswool with nylon and spandex for durability and a dependable fit; socks feature a low-bulk, ultralight flat-knit construction throughout. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Stretch nylon reinforces heel and toe areas for long-wearing durability and comfort; arch bands provide additional support. REI Merino Ultralight Hiker Quarter socks feature seamless toes that won't rub or cause chafing. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Comfortable for everyday wear or fast treks into the hills, our REI Merino Ultralight Hiker Quarter socks have a snug, sleek fit that works well with minimalist footwear.
